description:
---- Download the BEST CASINO game FOR FREE! ----

Play Slots Pharaoh's Gold 2 and enjoy the most authentic online casino experience right on your device!

Make a fortune with SUPER Payouts, Free Hourly Coins, Bonus Games, and more! Get ready to play Slots featuring HD 3D art and animations only seen before on real slot machines in the best casinos!

This slot machine is worthy of the Pharaohs, and now it's your turn to play. Just tap to spin!

Pharaoh's Gold Slots
The forsaken Pyramid across the desert holds a Golden Secret!

Excalibur Slots

Stealth Fighter Slots

Jolly Queen Slots

TOP FEATURES:

- Huge variety of top-quality slot machines (with more being released all the time!)

- Free bonus coins every hour – Collect higher coin amounts as you increase your player level!
- Progressive Daily Bonus Rewards
- Use Boosters to multiply your winnings. Win more Boosters with more game play

- Full Game Center integration
